item.description:
@Philip15 wrote:

try changing

class8.anIntArray156 = new int[1]; class8.anIntArray160 = new int[1];
to

class8.anIntArray156 = new int[2]; class8.anIntArray160 = new int[2];

item.title: Recoloring D scimi

item.description:
